# Hotspot

**Extends:** [TextureButton](../TextureButton)

## Description

A simple hotspot which can also move to a target scene upon
pressing

## Property Descriptions

### cursor\_type

```gdscript
export var cursor_type = 1
```

The cursor type

### target\_scene

```gdscript
export var target_scene = ""
```

If set, changes to the given scene

### target\_view

```gdscript
export var target_view = ""
```

### effect

```gdscript
export var effect = "[Object:null]"
```

If set, plays a sound effect when the hotspot is pressed and the
scene is changed

### visibility\_state

```gdscript
export var visibility_state = ""
```

Show this hotspot depending on the boolean value of this state
variable

## Signals

- signal activate(): A signal that can be connected to for custom actions of
this hotspot
